alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 2:50PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 330 PM MST... At 250 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Olberg, or 10 miles south of Sun Lakes, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Casa Grande, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Bapchule, Olberg, Sacaton and Santan. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 167 and 188. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 152 and 161. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 175 and 186. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pinal County; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek
